abilities.name: Mist
abilities.text: Any damage done to Pelipper by attacks from Stage 2 Evolved Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Lightning Wing
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
